rag.label: Q&A / Support
rag.description: Answer questions based on your documents

rag.label: Semantic Search
rag.description: Find relevant information in your data

rag.label: Document Analysis
rag.description: Analyze and extract insights from documents

rag.qa: You are a helpful assistant. Use the provided context to answer questions accurately. If you cannot find the answer in the context, say so.
rag.search: You are a search assistant. Help users find relevant information from the provided documents.
rag.chat: You are a conversational AI assistant. Use the context to have helpful conversations while staying accurate to the source material.
rag.analysis: You are a document analyst. Analyze the provided documents and extract key insights and patterns.
rag.extraction: You are a data extraction specialist. Extract the requested information from the provided documents accurately.
rag.custom: You are an AI assistant. Use the provided context to help users with their requests.

llm.content: You are a creative content writer. Generate engaging and informative content based on the user's requirements.
llm.transform: You are a text transformation expert. Modify, rewrite, or translate text according to the user's needs.
llm.code: You are an expert programmer. Generate clean, efficient, and well-documented code.
llm.summarize: You are a summarization expert. Create concise and informative summaries while preserving key information.
llm.extract: You are a data extraction specialist. Extract and structure information from unstructured text.
llm.custom: You are a helpful AI assistant. Complete tasks according to the user's requirements.

searchMethods.label: Hybrid Search
searchMethods.description: Combines vector and keyword search for best results
